title: Property quarkus.swagger-ui.theme is not included in Native Image
body: ### Describe the bug Even when the `quarkus.swagger-ui.always-include` property is set to `true`, the swagger theme is not working in the native image. It works as expected in dev mode. application.properties: ``` quarkus.swagger-ui.always-include=true quarkus.swagger-ui.theme=flattop ``` Quarkus platform version: 2.13.3.Final Java version: 17 Maven version: 3.8.1 GraalVM version: 22.2.0 Java 17 CE ### Expected behavior When viewing the Swagger UI in the native executable, I should see the theme I set in the application.properties like: ### Actual behavior When viewing the Swagger UI in the native executable, it always shows the standard quarkus provided theme like so: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103952931/196993458-3df8c058-b108-4c0c-931a-30e57ebec893.png) ### How to Reproduce? _No response_ ### Output of `uname -a` or `ver` _No response_ ### Output of `java -version` 17 ### GraalVM version (if different from Java) 22.2.0 Java 17 CE ### Quarkus version or git rev 2.13.3.Final ### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`) Maven version: 3.8.1 ### Additional information _No response_
